strong.span:
Information regarding the West Essex Regional School District's response to the 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-2019)
is now accessible in one spot on our website.
Click HERE to access this important information.
This site will be updated as necessary.

p.span: Welcome To West Essex School District!

span.span: We are excited to be launching the new West Essex Website. Our
evolving site is designed to be intuitive and inviting. We invite you to explore our enhanced navigability and welcome comments to Lisa Dyer or Anthony Rizzo.
